title: Improvement Proposals
body: # Dash (DIPs) Similar to Bitcoin's BIPs, a Dash Improvement Proposal ([DIP](https://github.com/dashpay/dips)) is a design document for providing information to the Dash community, or describing a new feature for Dash processes/environment. The DIP should provide a concise technical specification of the feature and a rationale for the feature. Please refer to the Dash DIP repository for details on the status of existing DIPs. # Bitcoin (BIPs) A Bitcoin Improvement Proposal (BIP) is a design document providing information to the Bitcoin community, or describing a new feature for Bitcoin or its processes or environment. Since Dash is forked from Bitcoin, some BIPs are applicable to both. Dash-specific BIP information can be found in Dash's BIP repository.The repository provides a list of the BIPs that are relevant to Dash. Note that some BIPs may only be partially implemented or modified to meet Dash requirements. The `Dash Status` column indicates if any changes were made.
body_html:
Dash (DIPs)

Similar to Bitcoin's BIPs, a Dash Improvement Proposal (DIP) is a design document for providing information to the Dash community, or describing a new feature for Dash processes/environment. The DIP should provide a concise technical specification of the feature and a rationale for the feature. Please refer to the Dash DIP repository for details on the status of existing DIPs.

Bitcoin (BIPs)

A Bitcoin Improvement Proposal (BIP) is a design document providing information to the Bitcoin community, or describing a new feature for Bitcoin or its processes or environment.

Since Dash is forked from Bitcoin, some BIPs are applicable to both. Dash-specific BIP information can be found in Dash's BIP repository.The repository provides a list of the BIPs that are relevant to Dash. Note that some BIPs may only be partially implemented or modified to meet Dash requirements. The Dash Status column indicates if any changes were made.
